spec_data.Name: perl-ExtUtils-Command
spec_data.Description:
This Perl module is used to replace common UNIX commands. In all cases the
functions work with @ARGV rather than taking arguments. This makes them
easier to deal with in Makefiles.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 11:40:07 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl routines to replace common UNIX commands in Makefiles
